overview:
Often, I like to say that â€œI have a telephone and I am not afraid to use it.â€ I love to connect people, ideas, and products, turning them into opportunities. I am also passionate about story-telling, and empowering people and customers to turn good products into experiences that make you go â€œWow!â€

I am a Marketing guy. A salesman. I am a blogger, a New Media Expert (whatever that is), a parent, and a technology enthusiast.

During the last decade I have worked in almost all facets of Media: Production, Content Licensing & Distribution, New Channel Development, Mobile Distribution, Mobile Payment, and online syndication. I have worked with “dumb” companies that produce and distribute hardware, to “creative” companies and many an innovative Start-Up.

My latest venture, TableTracker.com aims at re-defining the way that we make restaurant reservations and the way that restauranteurs communicate with their customers and promote their restaurants. Check us out at www.tabletracker.com and tell us how we are doing so far…

Bottom-line: I am proud of my ability to speak “geek” and “business,” and for my passion for the “Wow!” in everything I get involved with.

milestones.description: Founded TableTracker.com a restaurant booking service and community for foodies and restauranteurs.
Lead Tracker - CEO TableTracker.com a service of Social Booking LTD
